data.message: I....I don't understand. This isn't a eminem album....it's a compilation album. You have officially ran out of ideas.

replies.message: It wasn't supposed to be an eminem album, it was supposed to be a compilation album of his record label...
Well than it shouldn't be called "shady XV" it's should be called "shady records compilation record and re-releases"
15 years of shady you moron. record label is Shady Records
Shady XV = Shady 15, celebrates 15 years of Shady Records, showing the new and old that has made the label what it is.

But it's fucking retarded you Canadian fuck. He said a NEW ALBUM. This isn't new you dumb fuck. I understand that his label is shady records and I kinda figured that out already. He said a ALL NEW ALBUM. This is not that. So before you go off at the fucking mouth about nothing think first. I'm not stupid.
You are stupid sir
Why thank you sir
That's why it's 2 discs dummy. Each one is basically an album. One new. One compilation.

Kendall its an Eminem album,plus  Eminem said its going to have two disc, one disc with new songs featuring artist from shady records, another the second disc with the greatest hits. So therefore  its an new Eminem album.
Kendall you're a dumbass just shut up

I agree with Kendall. This whole compilation concept Is whack, i don't understand either. And i don't get why you cunts are hating on the dude because of his opinion. You bitches need to get a life, don't be mad cause he might be right.
Grant we are hating on him because its supposed to be a compilation album :Eminem never said it was a whole new album. Also the fact he said he ran out of ideas is just stupid
^Kendall
Im pissed too, i was stoked for this album when it was announced
You're so fucking stupid, omg.
Well that sucks I thought it was a new eminem solo album I really hated mmlp2 so I was hoping this would make up for it
Kendall you went full retarded you fucking dumbass.
^fake fan
^Hope your not talking about me I've been an eminem fan since 1999
Derr
Fuck off Emo bitch

These People Call Themselves Fans But They Didnt Know That It Was Supposed To Be A Comp..Album..And This Is The Best Shit To Come Out Of Shadu Records...Eminem Doesnt Need To Drop Albums Anymore This Is A Way Of Giving His Signed Artists Exposre So That Shady Records Dznt Relying On Him Dropping Albums 2 Be Relevent...Yeah Catfish Billy And Slaughter Have A Buzz But It They Aint 50c And This Album Will Help Em Get More Exposr

You just went full retarded. It's called Shady XV because 15 years of shady records so people who are ON shady records or was, is gonna be part of this album to celebrate 15 years, Eminem is the main guy obviously. The first disc is NEW stuff from these people in a compilation and the second disc is the most famous/most successful/older songs of Shady Records. He never said it was a new album, it's a compilation album. Does your retarded mind understand now?
